SET_PASSWORD.WELCOME_INFO: Welcome to Logoass. Please set new password
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO: Password length must be between 6 and 20 characters, must contain a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_ONE: Your password must be at least 6 and at most 20 characters long.
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_TWO: The password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_THREE: The password must contain at least one number.
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_FOUR: The password must contain one of the following special character (# | ! | ยง | $ | - | ?).
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_FIVE: Please do not use umlauts, sharp S or following special character (+ | % | &).
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_INFO_MESSAGE_SIX: Please make sure that the password field does not contain any spaces.
SET_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_CHANGED_SUCCESSFULLY_INFO: Password changed successfully. We will redirect you to sign in page
SET_PASSWORD.TOKEN_EXPIRED_INFO: Your link expired. Please send new password link to email
SET_PASSWORD.INVALID_TOKEN_INFO: Your link is used or expired. Please send new password link to email
